roleset.name: offering, suggestion

role.descr: who/what arg1 applies to (beneficiary, not listener)

example.name: with arg2
example.text: and proposition of a name for 66 additional unknown cultivars.

example.name: with PRD (taggable node is VP)
example.text: This proposition - approved by the public - trumps a court decision .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: There are a number of educationalists who are more radical in their proposition of a completely new paradigm in learning.
example.arg: of a completely new paradigm in learning

example.name: infinitival arg1
example.text: they envisioned a ripe environment for their proposition to repeal the state's clean energy and air standards:
example.arg: to repeal the state's clean energy and air standards

example.name: with arg3
example.text: The Magic are re-working their proposition to Phil Jackson with the hopes of luring him into a front office role

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, propose.01. Corresponds to VNcls reflexive_appearance-48.1.2, say-37.7-1, wish-62.
